shadow.name: DISLOCATION
shadow.description: Lost sense of direction, disconnection from life's flow
shadow.behavioral_signature: Aimless wandering, seeking external guidance constantly
shadow.thought_pattern: I don't know where I'm going. Someone needs to show me.

gift.name: ORIENTATION
gift.description: Natural ability to find the right direction through surrender
gift.behavioral_signature: Magnetic attraction to correct paths, effortless navigation
gift.somatic_signature: Centered in G center, stable internal compass
gift.thought_pattern: My direction finds me. I trust the pull.

siddhi.name: UNITY
siddhi.description: Complete dissolution of separation, all paths lead home
siddhi.behavioral_signature: Omnidirectional presence, every step is the Way
siddhi.somatic_signature: Boundless awareness, no center or periphery
siddhi.thought_pattern: There is nowhere to go. I am already there.

inversion_protocols.script: You are not lost. You are recalibrating. The G center is updating your coordinates. When you ask others 'what should I do?' you override your own magnetic guidance system. Direction is not found through thinkingâ€”it is revealed through sensation.
inversion_protocols.somatic_anchor: Stand barefoot. Close your eyes. Feel which direction your body wants to turn toward. Do not think. Feel the pull.

experiment.hypothesis: If I stop asking for advice and follow the physical pull, clarity will emerge.
experiment.action: Ban all directional questions to others. Use only body sensation to make choices.

success_criteria.target: Decisions made from body pull, not mental analysis
